thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Anthony Wingham

author: Anthony Wingham
title: Anthony Wingham
text:
The worst service, we had booked and our service included the meet and greet at the airport, we had to wait for over 30 minutes for someone to help us with the car, when we got it they blocked 28,000 pesos as a deposit, in the reservation didnt say that it was gonna be this amount.
The people working there was extremly rude and they gave us a crashed car. That is not the service that we hired.
I want you to make it up for us, we were expecting to start our vacation the best way possible and it didnt.
